Install

Work Relationships Made Simple

Internal is a personal relationship management system built on top of Slack. Refine how you think about your coworkers and learn how they think about you.

Learn More

Do you know your coworkers?

First impressions and isolated incidents weigh too heavily on our perceptions of others - getting in the way of allowing ourselves to know the authentic version of those around us. Internal tests your perception of your peers against who they believe they are, telling you where your feelings are potentially misaligned.

Do your coworkers know you?

Internal allows you to measure whether the version of yourself you present to your coworkers is being received positively or negatively. It’s really easy to believe you’re presenting yourself positively when you’re being received negatively, and now it’s also really easy to catch this dissociation.

Recognition

Figure out where your perception of yourself misaligns with your peers

Alignment

Align your perceptions with who your coworkers truly are

Cohesion

Strengthen bonds through positive emotional communication

One App...

is all you need.

Bot

Slack App

  • Perception Testing
  • Perception Misalignment Reports
  • Consensus Personality Insights
  • Relationship Change Tracker
Install

Internal builds bridges between people

There are too many important projects cut short by avoidable disagreements, families parted due to reversible resentment, and lives lost because of loneliness. Internal's intent is to fix these avoidable problems by bringing emotional transparency to relationships in a way that feels right.

Frequently Asked Questions

If there's no answer here, be sure to contact us

The questionnaire is a culmination of different, albeit adjacently related, psychometric tests, adjusted to maximize user experience. There are two versions - one to gauge the person you believe you are and one to gauge your perception of individuals you have relationships with.
Internal provides qualitative notifications about what your coworkers think of you - ranging from insights from individuals (ie “Marie thinks you’re more accommodating than you think you are”) to consensus views that contradict your perception of yourself (ie “The majority of your coworkers think you’re more tough minded than you do”)
Send us an email and we'll cancel your subscription within 12 hours.
Cancel My Subscription
We do, indeed, collect the necessary data to track relationship changes over time and for features of similar functionality. For more information, feel free to take a glance at our Privacy Policy for a detailed account of data collection
Privacy Policy

Internal builds bridges between humans by catalyzing and mediating difficult emotional conversations for important relationships.
